definition: variant of 砂鍋|砂锅[sha1 guo1]

sentences.english: You can also use it in casseroles to great effect.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以選擇用沙鍋來製備這一種肉湯。

sentences.english: Pairs well with red meats, poultry, terrines and cheese. Wine Enthusiast – 88 points.
sentences.chinese: 非常適宜搭配紅肉，禽類，沙鍋菜及乳酪。

sentences.english: Well suited to game, flavorful poultry or hearty casserole.
sentences.chinese: 適合搭配野味，味濃的禽類或沙鍋菜。

sentences.english: Particularly suitable as an accompaniment for white meat or grilled lamb and for terrines of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 非常適宜搭配白肉類，烤羊腿及沙鍋類蔬菜。

sentences.english: Have everyone bring a casserole to share or a dish.
sentences.chinese: 誰會去分享沙鍋菜或者是盤裝菜呢？

sentences.english: Pairs well with red meats, poultry, terrines and cheese.
sentences.chinese: 非常適宜搭配紅肉，禽類，沙鍋菜及乳酪。

sentences.english: Bake the casserole for an hour.
Would you like to order some more casserole?
sentences.chinese: 你要不要再來點沙鍋菜？

sentences.english: Best with roast meats and casseroles or stews.
sentences.chinese: 搭配烤肉或沙鍋燉菜口味頗佳。

sentences.english: Because I love to eat casserole stew, and the sand pot.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我喜歡喫沙鍋燉，和沙罐。

definition: variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
